topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55600b6a63687237805a1900#post_55600b6a63687237805a1900
Funny story about the kid. Me and my family went to Disney World one summer. It was suoer fun. And I decided to buy a souvenir. A bought the pendant from the first Pirates of the Caribbean film. O go back to school and show it off to everyone. Paul says that he's always wanted one so me being the cool guy that I am, I take it off and say "Happy birthday!" He immediately starts trying to give it back saying it's too much but I ain't havin' it.  So about two weeks go by and he wears the pendant everywhere. Then one day he walks straight up to me, goes into his bag, pulls out a belt buckle shaped like the Triforce and just gives it to me. And he looks at ke and goes "Happy birthday."
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
